scripts.start: concurrently "tsc -p core -w" "tsc -p webapp -w" "tsc -p services-ui-react -w" "tsc -p services-ui-preact -w" "tsc -p webpack-plugin-jst -w" "npm run start-rollup-plugin-jst" "npm run start-webcomponents"
scripts.build: tsc -p core && tsc -p webapp && tsc -p services-ui-react && tsc -p services-ui-preact && tsc -p webpack-plugin-jst && npm run build-rollup-plugin-jst && npm run build-webcomponents
